articles.content: Eminem released Curtain Call: The Hits in 2005, a compilation of the diamond-selling rapper’s biggest songs, including “The Way I Am,” “My Name Is,” “Guilty Conscience” and “Without Me.” As of 2017, … [+1722 chars]

articles.title: ‘Only Murders In The Building’ Renewed For Season 3 By Hulu - Deadline
articles.description: Only Murders in the Building will continue to make a killing for Hulu: The streamer has ordered a third season of the series from 20th Television. The first season debuted as the most-watched comedy series in Hulu Originals’ history and is considered a favori…

articles.title: Review: Danai Gurira Makes a Sleek Supervillain of Richard III - The New York Times
articles.description: At Shakespeare in the Park, athletic stamina and action-hero charisma muddy the meaning of a play about disability.
articles.content: It is nice to dream of a time when disabled actors are employed so frequently, and in so many kinds of roles, that we need not discourage others from playing this one. And its true that the historica… [+3086 chars]
